attributes.review: Crashes when you try to open, all around terrible app. Very scary wouldn’t recommend
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review:
Ok I was gonna play with this game until I saw our Oompa Loompa the orangest I’ve ever seen. Also the app is just TRASH (mostly because of our boomeroompa Oompa Loompa lookin orange)

attributes.title: Terrible orangeness

attributes.review: If I could give it a 0 star rating I would. Absolutely horrible and did not work as it was advertised to.
attributes.title: Worst app I have ever downloaded

attributes.review: I don’t know what happend but when I first opened this app, I suddenly got irritable bowels. Two hours later, I’m still here on the toilet. I feel bad for the plumber.
attributes.title: Crazy

attributes.review: This news app is factually incorrect. It constantly uses biases to attack people of color and people in the LGBTQIA+ community. I think that we shouldn’t support a news that isn’t for the people.
attributes.title: Mr. Cinnamon Hitler

attributes.review: This is the worst app ever. It spammed me for 48 hours straight. It made me throw my phone and break it when i saw Trumps face. So i had to get a new phone.  Do not buy this app if you want to get spammed.
attributes.title: Trash

attributes.review: The app caused me to have many horrible headaches that sent me into orbit. The app glitches nonstop and is not appealing whatsoever. I will not be having this horrendous app on my phone ever again ❤️
attributes.title: This app is not cute...

attributes.review: Wow, this app really let me down. Terrible customer support after crashing like crazy. If tik tok gets deleted, this won’t be the only thing going down.
attributes.title: Doo doo fart

attributes.review: this was the worst app i have ever used, there was a terrifying HUGE orange orangutan that i saw when i opened the app it was by far one of the most horrifying things that have ever happened to me.
attributes.title: ✨SCARY✨

attributes.review: i was horrified and disgusted at the very appearance of this app ... much more the contents🤢🤢🤢. imagine having the app of a RACIST BIGOT who could care about nothing less than his own agenda🤦🏾‍♂️
attributes.title: i hope yo app gets deleted 🥳
